thread.title: This Cricketer Is Hoping Virat Kohli And Anushka Sharma "Marry Each Other Soon"
thread.title_full: This Cricketer Is Hoping Virat Kohli And Anushka Sharma "Marry Each Other Soon"

title: This Cricketer Is Hoping Virat Kohli And Anushka Sharma "Marry Each Other Soon"
text:
facebook 167 SHARES 
Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma were rumored to be engaged last year, and while Virat went on record to deny it that doesn't mean that we are not hoping that these two get together this year. And looks like we are not the only one rooting for this. 
In a recent interview with PinkVilla, Virat's fellow cricketer, Harbhajan Singh was asked if Virushka should tie the knot soon and here's what he had to say. 
"Of course! Virat-Anushka and all other cricketers who're in a relationship should go ahead and marry each other soon. Though they're the ultimate decision makers, but I'll be happy to see them settled. Zaheer Khan should get married this year itself." 
Are you listening, Virat-Anushka?
